import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Audio(props) { let [audiotag , setAudioTag] = useState(''); let [playbtn , setPlayBtn] = useState(''); let [seekslidertag , setSeekSliderTag] = useState(''); // let [currenttimetag , setCurrentTimeTag] = useState('') let [currnettime , setCurrentTime] = useState("0:00"); let [audioduration , setAudioDuration] = useState("0:00") const root = document.documentElement; return (

{currenttimetag.value}

{currnettime}
{audioduration}
) }
